Key Match Events: Canada's defense held firm until conceding late goals
Pre-Game Insights: Jesse Marsch went with a similar lineup as in prior matches
Ismaël Koné was reintroduced into midfield
Argentina made changes to their starting lineup
Post-Match Reflections: Canada's performance was praised despite losing
Canada will face the loser of the other semifinal in the third place match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada's dream run at the Copa América came to an end
Canada had chances but missed them
Enzo Fernández and Lionel Messi were instrumental in Argentina's victory
